subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The Knicks savored their 125-113 victory over Milano, however sloppy it was, but they will have to be sharper for Wednesday’s game against the Minnesota Timberwolves.
snippet: The Knicks savored their 125-113 victory over Milano, however sloppy it was, but they will have to be sharper for Wednesday’s game against the Minnesota Timberwolves.
